interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: essence | Welcome to London Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Matte & Metallic Blendable Shades | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Free From Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles
Review Date: 2022/08/24
Store: essence cosmetics
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 0.46 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934871', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosnova'}
Review Text: This is my first time using essence eyeshadow and it will definitely not be my last. I never really use drug store eyeshadow and to be honest I don't think I have any in my collection.  But if this is the quality I can expect then that is about to change. I'm so impressed with the performance of these shadows! Most of the shades are buttery smooth and pigmented.  The mattes blend out so easily and I didn't get any patchiness. You do have to build these up but that is not necessarily a bad thing. There was quite a bit of kick up in the pan but I didn't get any fallout at all.  This color story is beautiful and even if you aren't a fan of colorful eyeshadow there's still lots to work with. I am very much looking forward to trying more palettes from this brand.
Review Title: I'm impressed!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Exfoliate everywhere!
essence | Welcome to London Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Matte & Metallic Blendable Shades | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Free From Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles
essence cosmetics
{'Brand': 'Essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 0.46 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934871', 'Manufacturer': 'Cosnova'}
This is my first time using essence eyeshadow and it will definitely not be my last. I never really use drug store eyeshadow and to be honest I don't think I have any in my collection.  But if this is the quality I can expect then that is about to change. I'm so impressed with the performance of these shadows! Most of the shades are buttery smooth and pigmented.  The mattes blend out so easily and I didn't get any patchiness. You do have to build these up but that is not necessarily a bad thing. There was quite a bit of kick up in the pan but I didn't get any fallout at all.  This color story is beautiful and even if you aren't a fan of colorful eyeshadow there's still lots to work with. I am very much looking forward to trying more palettes from this brand.
I'm impressed!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: This user values efficiency and ease in makeup and skincare application tools, with a preference for products that simplify maintenance tasks—including cleaning and enhancing their skincare routine. Their recent positive experience with a drugstore eyeshadow palette suggests an openness to affordable yet high-quality makeup options.

- **Performance Appreciation**: The user has a strong appreciation for high-performing products that meet or exceed expectations. Their recent review reflects satisfaction with the quality and blendability of makeup, indicating a willingness to explore new brands and formulations.

- **Practicality**: They gravitate toward practical solutions that save time and enhance their beauty routine, favoring items that provide multiple benefits with minimal effort. This adaptability to new product types reinforces their commitment to practicality.

- **Simplicity**: Their preference for straightforward, multifunctional items is evident in their willingness to adopt new makeup products that deliver significant results, maintaining a focus on convenience in their daily regimen.

- **Holistic Approach**: The user continues to show interest in comprehensive self-care by choosing products offering overall health and well-being benefits, indicating a well-rounded approach to their beauty and skincare routine.

Overall, this user's profile reflects a commitment to practical, effective, and efficient beauty solutions, showcasing an openness to exploring new products that enhance their daily routine.
